citations.narrative:
** The rabbits enclosures need to be cleaned. They had feces,covered in hair and other debris that needs to be
cleaned to prevent disease and illness. Correct by 11/1/2015

** The was clutter in several pens. There were wood beams and a stand in the enclosure for the pigs. In the area
where the sheep reside there was a tractor. In the llamas enclosure there was a fan on the ground and a big
cardboard number one sign. These items should be removed from the animals primary enclosures to ensure their
safety and prevent injury. Correct by 11/06/2015
The inspection and exit interview was conducted with the owner.
